message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $15,000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're offering, I'm looking to pay a bit less.  I'm willing to offer $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think!

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our offers. I'll counteroffer the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's true value to you is $15,000. Let me know if this works for you!
